episodes.title: Judgement Day: The Lori Vallow Trial | special report
episodes.description:
Join hosts Derek Staahl, Brianna Whitney, and Zack Prelutsky as they recap this week's end to one of the most high-profile crime cases in Arizona: the Lori Vallow Daybell trial.

In this video, we break down the key developments and discuss the verdict in the trial concerning the conspiracy to murder Charles Vallow.

episodes.title: FULL INTERVIEW: Lori Vallow-Daybell reacts to her guilty verdict in Arizona
episodes.description:
True Crime Arizona sat down once again with Lori Vallow-Daybell, also known as the 'Doomsday Mom,' just days after a jury found her guilty of conspiracy to commit murder against her ex-husband. 

The jury in Phoenix found her guilty after deliberating for about three hours, and she faces another possible life sentence on top of the three she is already serving in Idaho.

Check out our full coverage here: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLJQ20huef_NzQr3sB7OaHwuJjayKfLRUy

0:00 Intro
0:31 The Verdict: Guilty
1:14 Lori's Reaction and Near-Death Experience
2:07 Decision Not to Call Witnesses
3:47 The Judicial System and Presenting a Defense
5:39 Juror Feedback and Questions
6:59 Discussion of Tylee's Death
7:59 Tylee's Presence in Video Footage
8:32 The Domino Effect and Charles's Death
11:11 Reflecting on Testifying
12:08 Facing Her Brother in Court
12:56 Green Chili Chicken Enchiladas
14:25 Charles's Dating Life
14:50 Relationship with Chad Daybell
15:21 The Nephi Texts
16:37 Spiritual Interpretations
17:34 Explanation of "Be Like Nephi"
18:23 911 Call After Charles's Death
19:19 Regrets About Representing Herself?
20:24 Thoughts on Upcoming Trial

episodes.title: Exclusive: Lori Vallow Daybell talks about her conviction in Idaho
episodes.description:
In an exclusive interview, Lori Vallow Daybell explains why she didn't call any witnesses and what it was like to cross-examine friends and family members. She said the judge banned too many topics from the trial, so there wasn't a point in calling defense witnesses. She said she was trying to be friendly when she cross-examined her brother, Adam Cox and got emotional. Briana Whitney has more.
  
 For more Local News from KPHO:  https://www.azfamily.com/
 For more YouTube Content: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIrgpHvUm1FMtv-C1xwkJtw

episodes.title: Lori Vallow Daybell explains Tylee Ryan's death, 'family tragedy'
episodes.description:
Lori Vallow Daybell reacted in an exclusive interview to the guilty verdict and explained what she thinks happened to Tylee Ryan. The jurors didn’t know Vallow Daybell was convicted in Idaho of killing her two children, 16-year-old Tylee Ryan and 7-year-old J.J. Vallow, and conspired to kill Chad Daybell’s wife, Tammy Daybell. Vallow Daybell said Tylee killed herself after killing her brother J.J. Briana Whitney reports.

Full coverage: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLJQ20huef_NzQr3sB7OaHwuJjayKfLRUy

episodes.title: The Chad Daybell "Doomsday Prophet" Murder Trial | True Crime Arizona Podcast
episodes.description:
For nearly two months, the Idaho man known as the “Doomsday Prophet,” Chad Daybell, faced witness after witness as he stood on trial for the murder of his wife Tammy Daybell and the murders of Lori Vallow’s two young kids, Tylee Ryan, and JJ Vallow. 

The killings were all tied to radical religious beliefs that a Second Coming was approaching and that people were “light and dark” spirits. Come with us as we dive into some of the most important, powerful, and emotional testimony during the trial, and the moments after the the verdict and sentencing decision on the death penalty were announced.

#podcast #truecrimearizona #truecrimepodcast #azfamily

episodes.title: The latest on the search for two missing children of Lori Vallow
episodes.description: Kim Powell reports from Hawaii with the latest on the search for Lori Vallow and her two kids who have been missing since September. Timeline: https://tinyurl.com/wo9ophb

episodes.title: Email, text messages from Lori Vallow released about her moving with her kids

episodes.title: News Update: Kauai PD awaits orders on Vallow; School talks about girl whose bones possibly found
episodes.description:
People who live on the island of Kauai in Hawaii are anxiously awaiting to find out what will happen to Lori Vallow and Chad Daybell-- the couple at the center of a missing children's case out of Idaho and Arizona.
Story: http://bit.ly/2SqvReq 
"Recently, we came to the realization [that] it was our former student," said Raul Pina, the principal at John F. Long Elementary School in Phoenix.
Story: http://bit.ly/2udZjfP

episodes.title: Private Eye talks about tracking Lori Vallow's brother
episodes.description: Rich Robertson is the private investigator hired to track down Lori Vallow's brother, Alex Cox, and her two missing kids, JJ Tylee. Timeline: https://tinyurl.com/wo9ophb

episodes.title: Neighbors in Hawaii weigh in on Lori Vallow and Chad Daybell

episodes.title: Grandparents less optimistic after Lori Vallow misses deadline
episodes.description: Lori Vallow didn't show up to an Idaho Police Department like wanted her too and her missing kids' grandparents are less optimistic about how the case is going to end. Timeline: https://tinyurl.com/wo9ophb

episodes.title: No sign of Loria Vallow, kids after deadline in Idaho
episodes.description: A deadline came and went and there was no sign of Lori Vallow and her two kids who have ties to Arizona. Timeline: https://tinyurl.com/wo9ophb

episodes.title: Law enforcement tight lipped over Lori Vallow case in Idaho
episodes.description: Lori Vallow, who moved to Idaho from Arizona in the summer, has to show up to the Rexburg Police Department with her kids by Thursday but few people are talking about the case in the small town. Timeline: https://tinyurl.com/wo9ophb

episodes.title: Police release video from Charles Vallow death in Chandler, Arizona

episodes.title: Is Lori Vallow's brother a possible key player in the mysterious case surrounding the missing Idaho
episodes.description: Investigators take a closer look at Lori Vallow's brother in the case surrounding her family and missing kids

episodes.title: Bail reduced of Lori Vallow, mom of missing kids with ties to AZ
episodes.description: Her bail was reduced from $5 million to $1 million.

episodes.title: Family members of Lori Vallow raise questions after bond hearing in Idaho
episodes.description: The bond for Lori Vallow was lowered to $1 million during a court hearing on Friday in Idaho but after several family members spoke and reminded people they just want to know where the two missing children are.

episodes.title: Lori Vallow's bail drops to $1 million thanks to Idaho judge's ruling
episodes.description: Lori Vallow, the mother of two missing kids with Arizona ties, saw her bond drop to $1 million during a hearing in Idaho.

episodes.title: Missing kids' grandparents react to Lori Vallow being booked into Idaho jail
episodes.description: The grandparents of the two missings kids with Arizona ties have mixed emotions over the kids' mother, Lori Vallow, returning to Idaho and being booked into jail.

episodes.title: Lori Vallow lands in Idaho, booked into jail after FBI releases new photos
episodes.description: Lori Vallow, the mother of two missing kids with Arizona ties, was booked into an Idaho jail on Thursday, the same day the FBI released new photos of the children during a trip in September.

episodes.title: Idaho authorities ready for Lori Vallow arrival
episodes.description: Loria Vallow, the mother of two missing kids with Arizona ties, will soon be on a plane and heading to Idaho where authorities are ready for her.

episodes.title: Lori Vallow makes brief court appearance in Hawaii before Idaho extradition
episodes.description: Lori Vallow is on her way to Idaho after a brief court hearing in Hawaii on Wednesday morning.

episodes.title: Process underway for Lori Vallow being extradited to Idaho
episodes.description: The extradition process has begun as law enforcement starts to move Lori Vallow back to Idaho.

episodes.title: Law enforcement gets ready for Lori Vallow to be extradited to Idaho
episodes.description: Law enforcement from the local to federal level are preparing for the arrival of Lori Vallow in Idaho in connection to her two missing kids.

episodes.title: Lori Vallow's husband leaves Hawaii as she prepares to be extradited
episodes.description: Lori Vallow's husband Chad Daybell is now out of Hawaii and is probably going back to Idaho, where Vallow is expected to be sometime next week after being extradited.

episodes.title: Lori Vallow's niece shows up to court, lawyers deny show knows where the missing kids are
episodes.description: Lori Vallow's niece and her new husband showed up to court in a custody battle with her ex-husband who claims the niece knows where Vallow's missing children are, something the niece's lawyers deny.

episodes.title: Lawyers for Lori Vallow's niece answer questions about 2 missing kids
episodes.description: Lori Vallow's niece maybe one of the last people to see Tylee Ryan and J.J. Vallow and she was in court today in a child custody case. Her lawyers answered questions outside the courtroom.

episodes.title: New court docs used against Lori Vallow to show she's possibly a flight risk
episodes.description: Hawaii prosecutors used failed court orders of Lori Vallow, the mother of the missing kids with ties to Arizona, to keep her bond in Kauai at $5 million pending her extradition to Idaho.

episodes.title: Mother of Tylee's best friend describes Lori Vallow as the 'fun mom'
episodes.description: One of Tylee Ryan's best friends has fond memories of the teen and her mother says Lori Vallow was considered the fun mom who took the kids on adventures.

episodes.title: Doorbell video shows last known sighting of missing 7-year-old JJ Vallow
episodes.description: Recently released video shows what is believed to be the last video of missing 7-year-old Joshua "JJ" Vallow.

episodes.title: Court paperwork outlines web of lies from Lori Vallow about missing kids
episodes.description: Loria Vallow, the mother of missing kids with ties to Arizona, appeared before a judge in Hawaii, hours after court paperwork was released when detailed how police say she and her husband Chad Daybell lied to authorities about the missing J.J. Vallow and his sister Tylee.

episodes.title: Press conference on arrest of Lori Vallow, mom of 2 missing Idaho kids with AZ ties
episodes.description: The news conference was held by police in Kauani, Hawaii, where Lori Vallow was arrested.

episodes.title: RAW VIDEO: Kauai police answer questions about Lori Vallow case
episodes.description: The Kauai Police Department held a news conference with County prosecutors about the case of Lori Vallow, the mother of two missing kids with Arizona ties.

episodes.title: Explaining the charges of Lori Vallow, the mom of the missing Idaho kids with ties to AZ
episodes.description: Kauai Police arrested 46-year-old Lori Vallow on Thursday. She's charged with two felony counts of desertion of a child.

episodes.title: RAW VIDEO: Court hearing regarding bail and extradition for Lori Vallow
episodes.description: Lori Vallow, the mother of two missing kids with Arizona ties, faced a judge on Friday where lawyers debated her high bond and a hearing for extradition.

episodes.title: Grandmother of two missing kids with Arizona ties celebrates arrest of Lori Vallow
episodes.description: The grandmother of the missing kids with Arizona connections said she is happy that Lori Vallow is now in police custody and hopes it means police are one step closer to finding the missing children.

episodes.title: Arresting Lori Vallow may help police find her two missing kids with ties to Arizona
episodes.description: A private investigator believes that Lori Vallow may be more open to talking about where her two missing kids are now that she has been arrested.

episodes.title: Lori Vallow arrested in Hawaii
episodes.description: The mother of two missing kids with ties to Arizona has been arrested in Hawaii after not bringing the children to Idaho authorities.

episodes.title: Friends of Lori Vallow react after murder charges announced
episodes.description: Arizona's Family speaks to friends of Lori Vallow, who give their emotional reaction after murder charges were announced against Vallow and Chad Daybell

episodes.title: Lori Vallow and Chad Daybell have been indicted by a grand jury
episodes.description: Murder charges have been announced against Lori Vallow and Chad Daybell

episodes.title: Murder charges announced against Lori Vallow and Chad Daybell
episodes.description: Lori Vallow and Chad Daybell have been indicted by a grand jury on a number of charges including conspiracy, murder and grand theft.

episodes.title: Gilbert police release new body cam video of the death of Lori Vallow's brother
episodes.description: The Gilbert Police Department has released new body camera video from when officers arrived at Alex Cox's home after he died. Cox, is believed to be connected to the deaths of his sister Lori Vallow's children.

episodes.title: A look back at the Lori Vallow case
episodes.description:
With two dead spouses, two missing kids, and a dead brother, the cloud of suspicion continue to follow Lori Vallow. Now, she sits in jail awaiting charges related to the deaths of her children.

#lorivallow #truecrime #idaho #chandler #azfamily

episodes.title: Phoenix police looking into Lori Vallow's 3rd husband's death as disturbing recordings surface
episodes.description: The Phoenix Police Department is reviewing the death investigation of Lori Vallow's third husband as disturbing recordings reveal she talked about a murder and quoted scripture.

episodes.title: A hearing tomorrow could make Chad Daybell and Lori Vallow co-defendants
episodes.description: Chad and Lori Vallow could wind up as co-defendants after a hearing Thursday.

episodes.title: Before Friday's memorial, teachers in Gilbert describe JJ Vallow as full of energy
episodes.description: A memorial was held in honor of J.J. Vallow and Tylee Ryan in Gilbert and teachers talked about how much they miss J.J.

episodes.title: Friends, family remember JJ Vallow and Tylee Ryan
episodes.description: Friends and family in Idaho and Arizona are remembering JJ Vallow and Tylee Ryan, whose remains are believed to be found at Chad Daybell's property in Idaho.

episodes.title: Grandmother remembers 8th birthday of missing JJ Vallow, son of Lori Vallow
episodes.description: The grandmother of missing J.J. Vallow, son of Lori Vallow, posted a video about his eighth birthday.

episodes.title: Gilbert police release video of Charles Vallow, months before his death
episodes.description: Gilbert police released body camera footage of Charles Vallow from January 2019 when he was trying to serve a petition for a mental health evaluation on his wife, Lori Vallow.

episodes.title: Autopsy confirms Lori Vallow's brother died of natural causes
episodes.description: Lori Vallow's brother, Alex Cox, died of a blood clot in his lung, according to a new autopsy report, something that his family has been saying all along.

episodes.title: Husband of Lori Vallow's niece wore a wire
episodes.description: Here is how the FBI convinced someone in the circle of Lori Vallow, the mother of two missing kids with Arizona connections, to wear a wire.

episodes.title: The grandparents of missing JJ Vallow speak out about the disappearance of JJ and his sister Tylee.
episodes.description: We hear from the grandparents of Lori Vallow's missing son, JJ. He and his sister Tylee haven't been seen since September.

episodes.title: What Lori Vallow's mother and sister say about Vallow's two missing children.
episodes.description: Our Morgan Loew sat down with the mother and sister of Lori Vallow to talk about where her two missing children might be.

episodes.title: Lori Vallow's attorney requests docs about investigation into ex-husband
episodes.description: The lawyer for Lori Vallow filed five subpoenas in connection to the death investigation of her ex-husband, as well as the ex-wife of her current husband.

episodes.title: Lori Vallow used dead husband's credit card to buy items on Amazon
episodes.description: A family member says Lori Vallow used her dead husband's credit card and Amazon account to buy a wedding ring and other things.

episodes.title: Court documents reveal Lori Vallow believed her kids were zombies
episodes.description:
Newly released court documents revealed that Lori Vallow believed her two missing children were "possessed" and "zombies."

#lorivallowdaybell #truecrime #arizona #idaho #azfamily #chaddaybell

episodes.title: Chandler police release additional info on Lori Vallow case
episodes.description: The evidence released by Chandler police in October gave insight into the non-traditional religious beliefs of Lori Vallow and Chad Daybell and those in their inner circle.

episodes.title: Private investigator describes cracking Lori Vallow case
episodes.description: A private investigator who cracked open the Lori Vallow case talked exclusively to Arizona's Family about how he had no idea the case would unravel like it did.

episodes.title: New charges recommended against Lori Vallow and Chad Daybell
episodes.description: The Gilbert Police Department has recommended attempted first-degree murder charges against Daybell and Vallow in connection to Brandon Boudreaux being shot at in 2019.

episodes.title: MCAO reacts to lack of charges in Charles Vallow death case
episodes.description: Never-before-seen evidence shows investigators were questioning the self-defense claim from Alex Cox about why he shot and killed Charles Vallow so we asked the Maricopa County Attorney's Office why prosecutors never filed charges.

episodes.title: New evidence made public in Charles Vallow investigation
episodes.description: The Chandler Police Department released new documents and video interviews related to the death investigation of Charles Vallow, Lori Vallow's former husband.

episodes.title: Chandler police release new documents in Charles Vallow case
episodes.description: Chandler police released on Wednesday all of its files from the investigation into the death of Charles Vallow, the former husband of Lori Vallow, including new body-cam video, videos of detectives interviewing family members, documents and more.

episodes.title: RAW VIDEO: Chandler Police interview Lori Vallow after husband's shooting death
episodes.description: Chandler Police interviewed Lori Vallow Daybell after her brother, Alex Cox shot and killed her estranged husband, Charles Vallow.

episodes.title: RAW VIDEO: Chandler Police interview Tylee Ryan after Charles Vallow's death
episodes.description: Chandler Police have released videos of the interviews they conducted into the death of Charles Vallow on July 11, 2019. He was shot by Alex Cox, the brother of Vallow's estranged wife, Lori Vallow Daybell. More Details: https://www.azfamily.com/news/continuing_coverage/missing_idaho_kids/

episodes.title: True Crime Arizona: The Lori Vallow Case
episodes.description: Lori Vallow is accused of murdering her children, but she has not entered a plea yet because she has been deemed incompetent to stand trial. In this Arizona's Family Special, Morgan Loew and Kim Powell, who have been following this story since the beginning, explain how events played out and what could happen next.

episodes.title: Lori Vallow to stay in state hospital for longer duration
episodes.description: Lori Vallow will stay in a state hospital for a longer period of time after a licensed clinical psychologist deemed her incompetent to understand the charges against her.

episodes.title: What we learned from '48 Hours' report of Lori Vallow case
episodes.description: A new report on "48 Hours" shows the Chad Daybell children defending their dad, and believe Lori Vallow tried to frame their dad.

episodes.title: New documents give details in case Lori Vallow.
episodes.description: Police emails offer deeper insight about what happened to Lori Vallow's children, JJ and Tylee Ryan. Vallow is charged in their deaths.

episodes.title: New documents detail complex case against Lori Vallow
episodes.description: Thousands of pages of emails, police reports, photos and other evidence help answer some questions about the complex case against Lori Vallow.

episodes.title: Police reveal details of new indictment of Lori Vallow
episodes.description: The Chandler Police Department released new documents that show the evidence investigators say show Lori Vallow played a role in the shooting death of her former husband, Charles Vallow.

episodes.title: Police reveal details of new indictment of Lori Vallow
episodes.description: The Chandler Police Department released new documents that show the evidence investigators say show Lori Vallow played a role in the shooting death of her former husband, Charles Vallow.

episodes.title: Lori Vallow indicted on conspiracy to commit murder
episodes.description: Prosecutors announced the indictment of Lori Vallow, who is now facing a conspiracy to commit first-degree murder in connection to her fourth husband's death.

episodes.title: Lori Vallow indicted for death of former husband
episodes.description: A Maricopa County grand jury indicted Lori Vallow on a felony charge of conspiracy to commit first-degree murder in connection to the death of her fourth husband, Charles Vallow.

episodes.title: Indictment gives new details on Lori Vallow investigation
episodes.description: A drive-by shooting in Phoenix could be connected to Lori Vallow

episodes.title: Chad Daybell pleads not guilty in deaths of JJ Vallow, Tylee Ryan
episodes.description: As Lori Vallow is committed to a mental health facility, her husband Chad Daybell has pleaded not guilty to the deaths of her two children

episodes.title: Is Lori Vallow incompetent to stand trial?
episodes.description: As Lori Vallow's attorney files for a competency hearing, we take a look at what this could mean for her court case.

episodes.title: Lori Vallow incompetent to stand trial, doctor says
episodes.description: A court-appointed psychologist says Lori Vallow, accused of murdering her two kids, said she's incompetent to stand trial as Chandler police want her charged with conspiracy to commit murder in connection to the death of her late husband, Charles Vallow.

episodes.title: Chandler PD recommends charge against Lori Vallow in husband's 2019 death
episodes.description: The Chandler Police Department is recommending a conspiracy to commit first-degree murder charge against Lori Vallow in the 2019 death of her husband, Charles Vallow. The Maricopa County Attorney's Office will decide whether to prosecute her.

episodes.title: We hear from loved ones of two murdered children after indictments of Lori Vallow and Chad Daybell.
episodes.description: As former Chandler mom Lori Vallow and husband Chad Daybell are charged with murder, grieving relatives of the children are speaking out.

episodes.title: Chapter 5: Zombies
episodes.description: (published 9/1/2021) In this episode, Melanie and Ian Pawlowski discuss how the word “Zombies” came to be associated with Lori Vallow and Chad Daybell. Melanie is Lori’s niece, and this is the inside story of how Melanie’s new husband came to write a memo to the FBI, which described Vallow and Daybell’s cult-like beliefs. The episode takes excerpts from an interview originally conducted in the early summer of 2020.

episodes.title: Chapter 0: Breaking News
episodes.description: In this first episode, Kim Powell and Morgan Loew discuss the murder charges filed against Lori Vallow and Chad Daybell. What new evidence was revealed when prosecutors made their announcement? And they set the stage for the episodes to come, which will detail what led a dedicated wife and mother down the path to become a defendant in a notorious murder case.

episodes.title: Chapter 3: Lori Vallow heads to Idaho
episodes.description: With Lori Vallow's husband out of the picture—shot dead by her brother in Chandler, Arizona—Lori decided it was time for a fresh start. Lori, her brother, and her kids—JJ and Tylee—all moved to Rexburg, Idaho. However, shortly after arriving, Tylee disappeared. And two weeks later, JJ vanished.

episodes.title: Lori Vallow Case Update: 2,500 Police Documents
episodes.description: In this episode, Kim Powell and Morgan Loew discuss the recent release of thousands of pages of police reports, emails and other evidence in the Lori Vallow case. They include a never-before-released letter from Charles Vallow to Lori, as well as new evidence that Alex Cox left the country three days after he shot and killed Charles.

episodes.title: Lori’s Alibi
episodes.description: Lori Vallow’s attorneys filed a slew of new motions in court. Included among them is a notice that Lori has an alibi. In fact, she claims she has three of them. Morgan Loew and Amy Cutler break down this new development and more in this podcast update.

episodes.title: The Lori Vallow Split Decision
episodes.description: Morgan Lowe and Amy Cutler talk about the latest developments in the Lori Vallow-Chad Daybell case, including the judge’s decision to sever the cases and what this will mean for both sides. as we're five weeks out from the start of Lori’s trial.

episodes.title: The Verdicts - Lori Vallow's deady delusions
episodes.description: The verdicts in Lori Vallow's murder trial are in. Morgan Loew discusses them, what it means, and the next steps.

episodes.title: Chapter 6: The Evidence
episodes.description: Charles Vallow’s death was often a big question mark in the case, having been deemed self defense initially. However, new evidence released by Chandler Police show they never felt Lori and her brother were being truthful.

episodes.title: The Trial Begins
episodes.description: After three and a-half years, Lori Vallow stands trial for the deaths of Tylee, J.J., and Tammy Daybell. Morgan Loew and Amy Cutler break down the opening statements and testimony from the first days of the trial.

episodes.title: Case Update: The Charles Vallow Murder
episodes.description: Morgan Loew breaks down the latest developments in the conspiracy case against Lori Vallow, including the statement of probable cause, released by Chandler Police, which details what led up to Charles Vallow’s death, and how police believe Lori was involved.

episodes.title: Chapter 10: Lori and Chad
episodes.description: One thing is certain, Lori Vallow and Chad Daybell fell for each other—fast. After they met in October 2018, everything changed. But what was it that drew them to one another? This episode takes you through how they met, their love affair, and "loin fire."

episodes.title: Chapter 7: The Boudreaux Connection
episodes.description: On October 2, 2019 Brandon Boudreaux was driving to his Gilbert, Arizona home when someone opened fire and struck his vehicle. According to Boudreaux, only four people knew where he was living at that time. And he suspected the attempt on his life was connected to his ex-wife, Melani, and members of her family. Those family members are Lori Vallow and her brother, Alex Cox. Two years later, Gilbert Police have recommended that prosecutors file charges of conspiracy to commit attempted first degree murder against Lori and Chad Daybell. Reporters Kim Powell and Morgan Loew break down this latest criminal case against Lori and Chad.

episodes.title: Chapter 8: The Backyard
episodes.description: We've been going back and forth between the background of this case and the latest developments as the charges are stacking up against Lori Vallow and Chad Daybell. It's time to answer the biggest question of them all—where are the kids?

episodes.title: Chapter 9: The Religion
episodes.description: Lori and Chad are awaiting trial for the murders of JJ, Tylee and Tammy. The biggest question still remains—why? Investigators believe the couple used their religious beliefs to justify the murders. This podcast episode takes a deep dive into their beliefs and their so-called powers.

episodes.title: Chapter 2: Lori Vallow's Family
episodes.description: (Published June 20, 2021) In this episode, Morgan Loew speaks to Lori Vallow’s mother and sister. The interview took place in May of 2020, before Lori was charged with murder. But the conversation you will hear includes information about Lori’s past and possible motivations. This episode includes parts of the interview that have never been published before.

episodes.title: Chapter 11: Lori Vallow's Competency
episodes.description: (first published April 12, 2022) -- The Lori Vallow case is back in motion now that a judge says her competency has been restored. Kim Powell breaks down the latest on the case in this special episode.

episodes.title: Chapter 4: Where Are the Kids?
episodes.description: (Originally aired 8/8/2021) Lori Vallow and her brother abruptly moved from Arizona to Rexburg, Idaho, with her two kids, JJ and Tylee. But soon, both kids disappeared. Then, Lori and her new husband, Chad Daybell, also go off the radar. Where are they? And where are those two kids? In the middle of this already bizarre investigation, Lori's brother suddenly dies.

episodes.title: Chapter 1: A Death in Chandler
episodes.description: Charles Vallow had just arrived back in town. His marriage was falling apart. His wife had been behaving strangely. But Vallow was determined to keep things as normal as possible for his son and step daughter. Charles Vallow’s life came to a violent end in a Chandler rental home the morning of July 11, 2019. This episode chronicles what happened that day, what led up to it, and how this first death set the stage for the suspicious and cold-blooded deaths to come.

episodes.title: Introducing  True Crime Arizona: Lori Vallow's Deadly Delusions
episodes.description:
She was the perfect wife and mother for decades, until something changed. Lori Vallow is now connected in some way to six violent or mysterious deaths. A former husband, an estranged husband, two of her children, her brother and her new husband’s then-wife – all dead.

 True Crime Arizona: Lori Vallow's Deadly Delusions explores the events and issues that motivated Lori Vallow, throughout her life, and during the tumultuous and tragic year of 2019. We will speak to family members, friends, investigators and forensic experts in an effort to create the most complete picture of who Vallow is, and what turned her from perfect mother to criminal defendant.

episodes.title: Polygamous families evicted from their homes in Arizona
episodes.description:
